abstract: Target names Anu Gupta to new position of senior vice president for operational excellence.
lead_paragraph: The retail giant Target named Anu Gupta to a newly created role of senior vice president for operational excellence.

headline.main: Target Names Retail Executive to Lead Operational Excellence
headline.print_headline: Target Names Retail Executive to Lead Operational Excellence
